summary: DT: CONTACT STATED WHEN HE TOOK THE VEHICLE TO THE DEALER FOR ROUTINE SERVICES THE MECHANIC FOUND THAT  2 FRONT TIRES WERE WORN OUT BECAUSE THE IDLER ARM AND THE PITMAN SHAFT  NEEDED TO BE REPLACED .THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED AT NO COST TO CONSUMER  BECAUSE THE VEHICLE WAS STILL UNDER WARRANTY.  *AK  UPDATED 12/27/05. *JB
